Original: So, are you a new explorer? Welcome
to Tharsis.
[Page]
This is the [Color:5]Explorers Guild[Color:0], where
your kind pools their talents. It's
something like a mutual aid society.
[Page]
Now, if you want to operate in this
city as an explorer, you have to be
part of a guild.
[Page]
Oh, so you want to create your own
rather than joining someone else's?
Then write a name in that ledger.
[Page]
Though your guild will be your whole
identity in Tharsis, so think it over
carefully before deciding on a name.
Translation: So, are you a new explorer? Welcome
to Tharsis.
[Page]
This is the [Color:5]Explorers Guild[Color:0], where
your kind pools their talents. It's
something like a mutual aid society.
[Page]
Now, if you want to operate in this
city as an explorer, you have to be
part of a guild.
[Page]
Oh, so you want to create your own
rather than joining someone else's?
Then write a name in that ledger.
[Page]
Though your guild will be your whole
identity in Tharsis, so think it over
carefully before deciding on a name.

Original: [Color:3]Other players you StreetPass with may
see your guild name, character names,
and ship name.[Color:0]
[Page]
[Color:3]Please avoid names that are offensive,
infringe on other people's rights, or
contain personal information.[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:3]Other players you StreetPass with may
see your guild name, character names,
and ship name.[Color:0]
[Page]
[Color:3]Please avoid names that are offensive,
infringe on other people's rights, or
contain personal information.[Color:0]

Original: The [Color:5][Guild][Color:0] Guild... Very well.
Here's hoping you can live up to
the name.
[Page]
You'll want this. It's a letter of
introduction that'll get you into an
audience with the Count.
Translation: The [Color:5][Guild][Color:0] Guild... Very well.
Here's hoping you can live up to
the name.
[Page]
You'll want this. It's a letter of
introduction that'll get you into an
audience with the Count.

Original: Hmm... never seen you before. Welcome
to the [Color:5]Explorers Guild[Color:0].
[Page]
This is where explorers pool their
talents. It's something like a
mutual aid society.
[Page]
Normally, to operate in this city,
you'd need to create a guild...
[Page]
But I've already heard rumors of your
[Guild] Guild. It's good to meet
you in the flesh.
[Page]
If you need to, you can induct new
explorers here, though of course
you don't have to.
Translation: Hmm... never seen you before. Welcome
to the [Color:5]Explorers Guild[Color:0].
[Page]
This is where explorers pool their
talents. It's something like a
mutual aid society.
[Page]
Normally, to operate in this city,
you'd need to create a guild...
[Page]
But I've already heard rumors of your
[Guild] Guild. It's good to meet
you in the flesh.
[Page]
If you need to, you can induct new
explorers here, though of course
you don't have to.

Original: Doesn't look like you've been to see
the Count yet. You'll need to visit
the [Color:5]Mark Grand Court[Color:0] to get his okay.
Translation: Doesn't look like you've been to see
the Count yet. You'll need to visit
the [Color:5]Mark Grand Court[Color:0] to get his okay.

Original: Well, easy does it. I'm looking
forward to seeing what you can do.
Translation: Well, easy does it. I'm looking
forward to seeing what you can do.

Original: Next, you need to register the
explorers you want in the [Guild]
Guild and form an adventuring party.
[Page]
It's up to you who to recruit, but you
can't go wrong with a balanced party.
You can register yourself, of course.
Translation: Next, you need to register the
explorers you want in the [Guild]
Guild and form an adventuring party.
[Page]
It's up to you who to recruit, but you
can't go wrong with a balanced party.
You can register yourself, of course.

Original: Next, you need to register the
explorers you want in the [Guild]
Guild and form an adventuring party.
[Page]
It's up to you who to recruit, but you
can't go wrong with a balanced party.
You can register yourself, of course.
[Page]
[Color:3]The demo version allows a character
to reach [Color:5]level 10[Color:3]. This limit will
be lifted in the full game.[Color:0]
Translation: Next, you need to register the
explorers you want in the [Guild]
Guild and form an adventuring party.
[Page]
It's up to you who to recruit, but you
can't go wrong with a balanced party.
You can register yourself, of course.
[Page]
[Color:3]The demo version allows a character
to reach [Color:5]level 10[Color:3]. This limit will
be lifted in the full game.[Color:0]

Original: Guess you've made your party, then.
In that case, go to the [Color:5]Grand Court[Color:0]
and pay your respects to the Count.
Translation: Guess you've made your party, then.
In that case, go to the [Color:5]Grand Court[Color:0]
and pay your respects to the Count.

Original: It's... up to you how many people
you take out on an adventure, true.
[Page]
But Explorers Guild guidelines suggest
five-person teams for all but the
most skilled explorers.
[Page]
Just letting you know. But if you're
satisfied, go to the [Color:5]Grand Court[Color:0] and
pay your respects to the Count.
Translation: It's... up to you how many people
you take out on an adventure, true.
[Page]
But Explorers Guild guidelines suggest
five-person teams for all but the
most skilled explorers.
[Page]
Just letting you know. But if you're
satisfied, go to the [Color:5]Grand Court[Color:0] and
pay your respects to the Count.

Original: You can hardly go out adventuring if
you haven't formed a party! Come back
when you're serious.
Translation: You can hardly go out adventuring if
you haven't formed a party! Come back
when you're serious.

Original: "Oh, it's you. What brings you here
today, hm? Oh, is this for me?
[Page]
"Strike me blind...! It's the
[Color:5][Item:1434][Color:0]! I thought this had
been lost... Where did you find it?
[Page]
"This is a document outlining a way
of using two normally incompatible
fighting styles at once.
[Page]
"If you read this and develop a second
style, your strength and survival
potential will be greatly improved."
Translation: "Oh, it's you. What brings you here
today, hm? Oh, is this for me?
[Page]
"Strike me blind...! It's the
[Color:5][Item:1434][Color:0]! I thought this had
been lost... Where did you find it?
[Page]
"This is a document outlining a way
of using two normally incompatible
fighting styles at once.
[Page]
"If you read this and develop a second
style, your strength and survival
potential will be greatly improved."

Original: [Color:3]Subclasses are now unlocked for use.[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:3]Subclasses are now unlocked for use.[Color:0]

Original: [Color:3]From here on, a subclass or secondary
class may be assigned to your party
members at the Explorers Guild.[Color:0]
[Page]
[Color:3]Upon selecting a subclass, that
character can equip weapons and
armor appropriate to the class.[Color:0]
[Page]
[Color:3]You will also receive 5 extra Skill
Points. Skills for the subclass can
be learned to half the maximum level.[Color:0]
[Page]
[Color:3]To change a character's subclass, you
must have them Rest.[Color:0]
[Page]
[Color:3]In addition to subclasses, subweapons
are now unlocked. Subweapons are
second weapons held in the off hand.[Color:0]
[Page]
[Color:3]You cannot attack with a subweapon,
but you can use skills that require
it as a prerequisite.[Color:0]
[Page]
The guildmaster checks and rechecks
the document you gave him and nods
excitedly to himself.
[Page]
"This [Color:6][Item:1434][Color:0] will improve
the caliber of explorers in this
city without a doubt.
[Page]
"All thanks to your hard work. I'd
like to give you something for your
skyship as a reward.
[Page]
"If you go to the city gates,
I'll have something called a
[Color:6][Item:2192][Color:0] delivered there.
[Page]
"There are a lot of tornadoes in the
Sacred Mountains, but you won't have
anything to fear with that equipped.
Translation: [Color:3]From here on, a subclass or secondary
class may be assigned to your party
members at the Explorers Guild.[Color:0]
[Page]
[Color:3]Upon selecting a subclass, that
character can equip weapons and
armor appropriate to the class.[Color:0]
[Page]
[Color:3]You will also receive 5 extra Skill
Points. Skills for the subclass can
be learned to half the maximum level.[Color:0]
[Page]
[Color:3]To change a character's subclass, you
must have them Rest.[Color:0]
[Page]
[Color:3]In addition to subclasses, subweapons
are now unlocked. Subweapons are
second weapons held in the off hand.[Color:0]
[Page]
[Color:3]You cannot attack with a subweapon,
but you can use skills that require
it as a prerequisite.[Color:0]
[Page]
The guildmaster checks and rechecks
the document you gave him and nods
excitedly to himself.
[Page]
"This [Color:6][Item:1434][Color:0] will improve
the caliber of explorers in this
city without a doubt.
[Page]
"All thanks to your hard work. I'd
like to give you something for your
skyship as a reward.
[Page]
"If you go to the city gates,
I'll have something called a
[Color:6][Item:2192][Color:0] delivered there.
[Page]
"There are a lot of tornadoes in the
Sacred Mountains, but you won't have
anything to fear with that equipped.

Original: "By the way... you said you got this
[Color:5][Item:1434][Color:0] from a Sentinel
named Kibagami?
[Page]
"You should go from here to the
Outland Count. You'll want his support
to solve the Sentinels' problem."
Translation: "By the way... you said you got this
[Color:5][Item:1434][Color:0] from a Sentinel
named Kibagami?
[Page]
"You should go from here to the
Outland Count. You'll want his support
to solve the Sentinels' problem."

Original: Ah, you're here. I heard you managed
to do that job I asked for.
[Page]
Well, as promised, here's your other
reward. Personal training from me!
Now, come at me!
Translation: Ah, you're here. I heard you managed
to do that job I asked for.
[Page]
Well, as promised, here's your other
reward. Personal training from me!
Now, come at me!

Original: [Color:3]The number of [Color:5]Burst Skills[Color:3] you can
set has increased to [Color:5][Number:0][Color:3]![Color:0]
Translation: [Color:3]The number of [Color:5]Burst Skills[Color:3] you can
set has increased to [Color:5][Number:0][Color:3]![Color:0]

Original: There... now you've seen my secret
technique. You should be able to use
more special skills in battle.
Translation: There... now you've seen my secret
technique. You should be able to use
more special skills in battle.

Original: And with that, I've taught you
everything I can.
[Page]
You may mock me to say that you have
fully mastered combat, but I doubt any
other guild can do what you can now!
Translation: And with that, I've taught you
everything I can.
[Page]
You may mock me to say that you have
fully mastered combat, but I doubt any
other guild can do what you can now!

Original: Your [Guild] Guild is now officially
Tharsis-sanctioned. On paper, anyway.
[Page]
To become fully accredited explorers,
you must complete the Outland Count's
initiation mission.
Translation: Your [Guild] Guild is now officially
Tharsis-sanctioned. On paper, anyway.
[Page]
To become fully accredited explorers,
you must complete the Outland Count's
initiation mission.

Original: Ah, it's you. The Outland Count told
me you got through the mission.
[Page]
But don't let it get to your head.
You've just reached the starting line.
Don't neglect your training.
Translation: Ah, it's you. The Outland Count told
me you got through the mission.
[Page]
But don't let it get to your head.
You've just reached the starting line.
Don't neglect your training.

Original: I see you've been into the Lush
Woodlands by now. A lot bigger than
the Old Forest Mine, isn't it?
[Page]
The beasties there are stronger, too.
Even skilled adventurers go missing in
that place. Getting cold feet yet?
Translation: I see you've been into the Lush
Woodlands by now. A lot bigger than
the Old Forest Mine, isn't it?
[Page]
The beasties there are stronger, too.
Even skilled adventurers go missing in
that place. Getting cold feet yet?

Original: They say that new floor you've reached
still has one unexplored area, but no
one has found it yet...
[Page]
Why don't you try to be the first?
The labyrinth doesn't have feelings.
It doesn't care who explores it.
[Page]
There's no need to tiptoe around your
seniors in the guild just because
you're a pack of rookies.
Translation: They say that new floor you've reached
still has one unexplored area, but no
one has found it yet...
[Page]
Why don't you try to be the first?
The labyrinth doesn't have feelings.
It doesn't care who explores it.
[Page]
There's no need to tiptoe around your
seniors in the guild just because
you're a pack of rookies.

Original: So you accepted the mission, did you?
You're up against a beastie that's
made mincemeat of trained soldiers.
[Page]
You don't have much in the way of
experience or skill yet...
[Page]
So you've got to hone your bodies and
minds! You can get a taste of victory
only after you've worked for it!
Translation: So you accepted the mission, did you?
You're up against a beastie that's
made mincemeat of trained soldiers.
[Page]
You don't have much in the way of
experience or skill yet...
[Page]
So you've got to hone your bodies and
minds! You can get a taste of victory
only after you've worked for it!

Original: I heard you solved the mystery of the
northern barrier. How does it feel to
be the first?
[Page]
Seems like it was just the other day
that you established your guild.
[Page]
That's one thing about the labyrinth:
it'll surprise you every time. I'm
interested to see what you do next.
Translation: I heard you solved the mystery of the
northern barrier. How does it feel to
be the first?
[Page]
Seems like it was just the other day
that you established your guild.
[Page]
That's one thing about the labyrinth:
it'll surprise you every time. I'm
interested to see what you do next.

Original: So, you've reached a new dungeon.
This one's the Misty Ravine, eh?
[Page]
We don't know anything about whatever
is past this point, but the basic
skills you've honed still apply.
[Page]
Make sure to keep up your training.
A first-class explorer always evolves
and adapts to new situations.
Translation: So, you've reached a new dungeon.
This one's the Misty Ravine, eh?
[Page]
We don't know anything about whatever
is past this point, but the basic
skills you've honed still apply.
[Page]
Make sure to keep up your training.
A first-class explorer always evolves
and adapts to new situations.

Original: It sounds like things have been a bit
rocky for you. I've heard maps don't
help much in all that thick mist.
[Page]
But explorers get stronger by putting
themselves in extreme situations! You
should embrace the traps and beasties!
[Page]
They're what will fuel your advance
to a higher caliber of explorer.
So keep up the training!
Translation: It sounds like things have been a bit
rocky for you. I've heard maps don't
help much in all that thick mist.
[Page]
But explorers get stronger by putting
themselves in extreme situations! You
should embrace the traps and beasties!
[Page]
They're what will fuel your advance
to a higher caliber of explorer.
So keep up the training!

Original: Vessels... Hollows... the Medium...
It's like you've opened a box with no
end of unbelievable things inside.
[Page]
And there's no closing it again now.
You need to take responsibility and
get it under control.
Translation: Vessels... Hollows... the Medium...
It's like you've opened a box with no
end of unbelievable things inside.
[Page]
And there's no closing it again now.
You need to take responsibility and
get it under control.

Original: Ever since your [Guild] Guild got
to Tharsis, the stagnant feeling I've
had has been completely wiped away.
[Page]
The citizens of Tharsis and the
explorers of the guild are looking
livelier than before, too.
[Page]
Your guild's like the wind that blew
away that barrier...
Translation: Ever since your [Guild] Guild got
to Tharsis, the stagnant feeling I've
had has been completely wiped away.
[Page]
The citizens of Tharsis and the
explorers of the guild are looking
livelier than before, too.
[Page]
Your guild's like the wind that blew
away that barrier...

Original: Hyaaaaahhh!
Translation: Hyaaaaahhh!

Original: That secret technique you brought back
with you... It'll help everyone in
the Guild grow stronger.
[Page]
But don't neglect your own training.
Now that you can learn twice as many
skills...
[Page]
It means you need to train twice as
hard! Push yourselves to the limit
and polish those skills!
Translation: That secret technique you brought back
with you... It'll help everyone in
the Guild grow stronger.
[Page]
But don't neglect your own training.
Now that you can learn twice as many
skills...
[Page]
It means you need to train twice as
hard! Push yourselves to the limit
and polish those skills!

Original: What do you think, [Guild] Guild?
[Page]
A mysterious barrier to the north in
every land... New races beyond each
one... I'm sensing a pattern here.
[Page]
This can't be a coincidence, can it?
If this was somehow done deliberately,
then... Who will we meet next?
Translation: What do you think, [Guild] Guild?
[Page]
A mysterious barrier to the north in
every land... New races beyond each
one... I'm sensing a pattern here.
[Page]
This can't be a coincidence, can it?
If this was somehow done deliberately,
then... Who will we meet next?

Original: Black skyships past the barrier, hm?
It sounds like getting past the Golden
Lair wasn't entirely a good thing.
[Page]
I suspect we'll all be looking to you
from here on out.
[Page]
When the time comes... you must step
up and be the ones who tell us what
the right and wrong moves are.
Translation: Black skyships past the barrier, hm?
It sounds like getting past the Golden
Lair wasn't entirely a good thing.
[Page]
I suspect we'll all be looking to you
from here on out.
[Page]
When the time comes... you must step
up and be the ones who tell us what
the right and wrong moves are.

Original: Whirlwind... So he was the one pulling
the strings behind this thing...
[Page]
That means he's been pulling the wool
over our eyes ever since he came to
Tharsis ten years ago.
[Page]
Hahaha! We've been played for fools!
So, [Guild], what will you do? You
won't take this lying down, right?
Translation: Whirlwind... So he was the one pulling
the strings behind this thing...
[Page]
That means he's been pulling the wool
over our eyes ever since he came to
Tharsis ten years ago.
[Page]
Hahaha! We've been played for fools!
So, [Guild], what will you do? You
won't take this lying down, right?

Original: Is this your first time in some ruins?
You need to be careful of both natural
and man-made traps.
[Page]
The good thing about the man-made ones
is that there's always a way to disarm
them. You just have to figure it out.
Translation: Is this your first time in some ruins?
You need to be careful of both natural
and man-made traps.
[Page]
The good thing about the man-made ones
is that there's always a way to disarm
them. You just have to figure it out.

Original: Looks like your exploration of the
Echoing Library is coming to a close.
Hmm... do you have enough enthusiasm?
[Page]
Enthusiasm alone doesn't accomplish
anything, but without enthusiasm,
you won't get anything done...
[Page]
More and more rookies here have been
looking up to you. So pardon me if
I get a little preachy at times.
Translation: Looks like your exploration of the
Echoing Library is coming to a close.
Hmm... do you have enough enthusiasm?
[Page]
Enthusiasm alone doesn't accomplish
anything, but without enthusiasm,
you won't get anything done...
[Page]
More and more rookies here have been
looking up to you. So pardon me if
I get a little preachy at times.

Original: The great tree has withered. This is
a dark time for us all, [Guild]
Guild.
[Page]
But what you're searching for isn't
necessarily something that can be
seen, is it?
[Page]
Even after Yggdrasil's withered,
what you're after should still
be there.
[Page]
You have to fix your eyes on your
goal and reach out for it!
Translation: The great tree has withered. This is
a dark time for us all, [Guild]
Guild.
[Page]
But what you're searching for isn't
necessarily something that can be
seen, is it?
[Page]
Even after Yggdrasil's withered,
what you're after should still
be there.
[Page]
You have to fix your eyes on your
goal and reach out for it!

Original: So... he's back. If I'm being honest,
my first instinct was to punch him.
[Page]
But since you've already given him
a pummeling on behalf of the city...
I'll let it go this time.
Translation: So... he's back. If I'm being honest,
my first instinct was to punch him.
[Page]
But since you've already given him
a pummeling on behalf of the city...
I'll let it go this time.

Original: Those Imperial knights... They're very
interesting fellows.
[Page]
Their fighting style is based around
the drive blade. It's very unusual,
but I suggest you ask them about it.
Translation: Those Imperial knights... They're very
interesting fellows.
[Page]
Their fighting style is based around
the drive blade. It's very unusual,
but I suggest you ask them about it.

Original: Ah... the [Guild] Guild. You're
going, aren't you?
[Page]
Everything you've trained for until
now... The time has come for you to
be put to the test.
[Page]
Just have no fear and believe in
yourselves. The things you learned on
your journey weren't for nothing.
Translation: Ah... the [Guild] Guild. You're
going, aren't you?
[Page]
Everything you've trained for until
now... The time has come for you to
be put to the test.
[Page]
Just have no fear and believe in
yourselves. The things you learned on
your journey weren't for nothing.

Original: Heh... it seems you found yourself
one hell of an adversary.
[Page]
Even I never met anything of that
magnitude in my adventuring days!
[Page]
Your battle against that godlike Titan
is something right out of myth! I...
I'm so jealous...
Translation: Heh... it seems you found yourself
one hell of an adversary.
[Page]
Even I never met anything of that
magnitude in my adventuring days!
[Page]
Your battle against that godlike Titan
is something right out of myth! I...
I'm so jealous...

Original: Welcome back, [Guild] Guild. I'd say
you've realized every explorer's
deepest dream here.
[Page]
But it's no miracle. Just the hard-
earned result of all the effort
you've put in up to now.
[Page]
The strength you gained along your
journey just happened to be greater
than Yggdrasil or that Titan.
[Page]
You earned this victory by the sweat
of your own brow... And that's the
only kind of victory worth winning!
Translation: Welcome back, [Guild] Guild. I'd say
you've realized every explorer's
deepest dream here.
[Page]
But it's no miracle. Just the hard-
earned result of all the effort
you've put in up to now.
[Page]
The strength you gained along your
journey just happened to be greater
than Yggdrasil or that Titan.
[Page]
You earned this victory by the sweat
of your own brow... And that's the
only kind of victory worth winning!

Original: It's certainly possible that only you,
the strongest explorers in Tharsis,
could have done this...
[Page]
But don't go boasting about it.
The honor of being the strongest
constantly changes hands...
[Page]
If you want to stay top dog, then
don't neglect your training! You
can't ever rest on your laurels!
Translation: It's certainly possible that only you,
the strongest explorers in Tharsis,
could have done this...
[Page]
But don't go boasting about it.
The honor of being the strongest
constantly changes hands...
[Page]
If you want to stay top dog, then
don't neglect your training! You
can't ever rest on your laurels!

Original: So what brings you here today? What?
You found a new dungeon? Ha... Hahaha!
[Page]
Hahahahaha! That's wonderful!
Oh, [Guild] Guild!
[Page]
It wasn't enough that you vanquished
the Titan and kept Yggdrasil's power
in check, eh!?
[Page]
Now I really feel like I need to keep
an eye on you to the end, to see just
how high you can climb.
Translation: So what brings you here today? What?
You found a new dungeon? Ha... Hahaha!
[Page]
Hahahahaha! That's wonderful!
Oh, [Guild] Guild!
[Page]
It wasn't enough that you vanquished
the Titan and kept Yggdrasil's power
in check, eh!?
[Page]
Now I really feel like I need to keep
an eye on you to the end, to see just
how high you can climb.

Original: Hrrrruuuurrrghhh!
Translation: Hrrrruuuurrrghhh!

Original: All packed up for your trip yet?
I was just thinking about all the
chaos we've seen since you arrived.
[Page]
I noticed you always took the lead in
bringing new things to Tharsis.
[Page]
Thanks to you, we have a much higher
quality of explorers here. Fewer
people just wasting their lives.
[Page]
But the most important thing you
brought us is intangible. I'm sure
everyone in Tharsis knows what it is.
[Page]
I should express my gratitude too...
Thank you, [Guild] Guild. May
your days continue to be blessed.
[Page]
Though you'd better not neglect your
training once you leave me behind.
I'd hate for you to turn spineless!
Translation: All packed up for your trip yet?
I was just thinking about all the
chaos we've seen since you arrived.
[Page]
I noticed you always took the lead in
bringing new things to Tharsis.
[Page]
Thanks to you, we have a much higher
quality of explorers here. Fewer
people just wasting their lives.
[Page]
But the most important thing you
brought us is intangible. I'm sure
everyone in Tharsis knows what it is.
[Page]
I should express my gratitude too...
Thank you, [Guild] Guild. May
your days continue to be blessed.
[Page]
Though you'd better not neglect your
training once you leave me behind.
I'd hate for you to turn spineless!

Original: [Color:5]Have you gotten cold feet?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Have you gotten cold feet?[Color:0]

Original: Haha, at least you're not afraid to
admit it! A healthy respect for the
labyrinth is good for an explorer.
[Page]
You're right to fear the unseen
enemies every step of the way, and the
natural traps, too. Always be alert.
Translation: Haha, at least you're not afraid to
admit it! A healthy respect for the
labyrinth is good for an explorer.
[Page]
You're right to fear the unseen
enemies every step of the way, and the
natural traps, too. Always be alert.

Original: Courage is a fine thing. But it's
those who rush through the labyrinth
recklessly that are the first to die.
[Page]
I've seen too many rash explorers in
my many years... Let those poor souls
be a lesson to you.
Translation: Courage is a fine thing. But it's
those who rush through the labyrinth
recklessly that are the first to die.
[Page]
I've seen too many rash explorers in
my many years... Let those poor souls
be a lesson to you.

Original: Oh... didn't notice you there. Sorry
about the glare. I'm actually working
on a new skill...
[Page]
Since your adventures are getting more
hair-raising, I was hoping to help by
polishing my skills... Hyaaaahhh!
Translation: Oh... didn't notice you there. Sorry
about the glare. I'm actually working
on a new skill...
[Page]
Since your adventures are getting more
hair-raising, I was hoping to help by
polishing my skills... Hyaaaahhh!

Original: Hmmm... No, still not enough.
Translation: Hmmm... No, still not enough.

Original: Oh, you were here? Sorry, I hope I
didn't blind you. I've been polishing
my skill even further.
[Page]
That mysterious labyrinth you've been
going to... I heard not a hair of light
gets in and couldn't stop myself.
[Page]
...Hrrrruuuurrrghhh!
Translation: Oh, you were here? Sorry, I hope I
didn't blind you. I've been polishing
my skill even further.
[Page]
That mysterious labyrinth you've been
going to... I heard not a hair of light
gets in and couldn't stop myself.
[Page]
...Hrrrruuuurrrghhh!

Original: Hrm...
[Page]
Maybe the way this skill will never be
complete makes it complete already.
Translation: Hrm...
[Page]
Maybe the way this skill will never be
complete makes it complete already.
